goal.en: “1. Establish background in analytical chemistry 2. Learn to identify key issues in chemical systems and methods to resolve difficulties 3. Acquire the ability to perform experiments in chemical analysis“
goal.ch: “建立學生分析化學專業知識 了解分析化學的問題與提出可能的解決方案“

content.en:
Nature of analytical measurements
2. Precision and accuracy of chemical analysis
3. Random errors in chemical analysis
4. Statistical data treatment and evaluation
5. Sampling, standardization, and calibration
content.ch:
1. Nature of analytical measurements
2. Precision and accuracy of chemical analysis
3. Random errors in chemical analysis
4. Statistical data treatment and evaluation
5. Sampling, standardization, and calibration

textbook.en: Textbook: Fundamentals of Analytical Chemistry, 10th edition, by Skoog, West, Holler, and Crouch (2021). Reference: Quantitative Chemical Analysis, 10th edition, by Daniel C. Harris (2020).
textbook.ch: Textbook: Fundamentals of Analytical Chemistry, 10th edition, by Skoog, West, Holler, and Crouch (2021). Reference: Quantitative Chemical Analysis, 10th edition, by Daniel C. Harris (2020).

grading.en: “1st term exam 34％ 2nd term exam 33％ Final exam 33％
grading.ch: 1st term exam 34％ 2nd term exam 33％ Final exam 33％

flex_desc.en: review key concepts lectured in the previous 16 weeks
flex_desc.ch: 複習前16週上課重點內容

en.competency: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

ch.competency: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力

en: Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Second Year only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Joint Science Program only.Year:Non-First Year only.

系所:限化學學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限輔系-化學學系、雙主修-化學學系。
